page.title: 12HOME LIFE
page.content: HOME LIFE. Most people own their own homes;many of those who live in council houses are now buying them. Many wives go out to work as well as husbands,even if their employment is only part-time.The main meal prepared by most women is the evening meal,eaten when husbands get home from work.Husbands are frequently required to travel overseas or to other parts of this country in connection with their work.Mothers are then left for several days,managing the home and caring for the children on their own. Mothers help each other with the children in many ways. Most families keep at least one domestic pet,cats or dogs being by far the most popular.
